messages.title: A record of action. A promise of more.
messages.content: With your support on June 8th, Norman will: Use a 1p increase on all rates of income tax to inject £6 billion each year into our NHS and social care. Reverse cuts to schools and invest £7 billion to ensure no local schools lose teachers or teaching assistants. Fight to protect local jobs and safeguard our local economy by keeping Britain in the single market.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Use a 1p increase on all rates of income tax to inject £6 billion each year into our NHS and social care.
Reverse cuts to schools and invest £7 billion to ensure no local schools lose teachers or teaching assistants.
Fight to protect local jobs and safeguard our local economy by keeping Britain in the single market.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Elections here are always close between the Lib Dems and Conservatives. Labour always finish a poor and distant third. Your vote on June 8th will decide whether Norman can carry on his hard work for local communities.
